commandsListTooltip: Udfør `+help <kommandoens navn>` for at lære mere om en bestemt kommando.
madeBy: | Botten er lavet med massere af pleje af %%q10%%

help.description: Shows you all available commands and other info about the bot.

prefix.description: Gives you the appropriate prefix for your language(s).

quote.description: Gets (or adds) a funny/weird/wise quote from the server.

mention.description: Nævner en sprogrolle med en valgfri besked.

context.description: Gets, adds or edits context for the given string ID. `+context help` shows you information about this command.

bug.description: Giver dig muligheden for at rapportere fejl, der er til stede i botten.

feedback.description: Sends your feedback on the bot to staff.

language.description: Changes your language, shows your current one or shows a list of available languages.
